name: 張正春
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4)FIR數位濾波器設計 (5)IIR數位濾波器設計 (6)適應性訊號處理介紹 (7)工程應用及實例研討。
schedule:
Week	Topic	Memo

2	Review of sinusoidal signals	
3	Spectrum representation and Fourier series	Quiz1
4	Spectrum representation and Fourier series	
5	Sampling theorem	
6	Sampling and reconstruction	
7	Discrete time system and LTI system	
8	FIR filters	
9	MIDTERM	
10	Frequency response of FIR filters	
11	Z-transform and its applications	
12	Z-transform and its applications

14	DFT and its applications	
15	DFT and its applications	
16	FFT and its applications
